pullRequest.title: parse innerExpression and remove sql parameter in SelectStatementContext

commit.message: parse innerExpression and remove sql parameter in SelectStatementContext

nodes.bodyText: The result of ctx.start.getInputStream().getText() and ctx.getText() are the same?

Do you think ctx.getChild(1)).getSymbol().getStartIndex() == ctx.LP_().getSymbol().getStartIndex()?
From the definition of aggregationFunction ,
aggregationFunction
    : aggregationFunctionName LP_ distinct? (expr (COMMA_ expr)* | ASTERISK_)? RP_
What we want is from LP_ to RP_, right?
Here the check style is out of rule, so you correct them?
